title: i cannot reach google support. im waiting 2 weeks for a response
content: i have e-mailed google support 3 times about my pixel 3 but there is no response. there is no chat option in my setting menu.when i want to call google there is no phone number. and when u call store support (i know its not the right department) u hear google assistent en tell you to look on the website. i live in the netherlands. do any more (europe) users experience the same?
